DIA_Bandit_QA302_Cutscene_03_01: I watched Ernesto, just like you said...
DIA_Bandit_QA302_Cutscene_03_03: I was running from someone... I think they were following me...
DIA_Bandit_QA302_Cutscene_03_04: I think they belonged to the Araxos Guild...
DIA_Bandit_QA302_Cutscene_03_05: I have no idea who they were...
DIA_Leader_QA302_Cutscene_03_06: So what, you brought them to us?!
DIA_Bandit_QA302_Cutscene_03_07: I figured that since there were more of us, we could handle them, and no one would know about our action!
DIA_Leader_QA302_Cutscene_03_08: Hm... that's... not a bad plan. Boys, get your gear ready!
